CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1959, pg. 3, reads: "Making it Official - These men sat in at the official signing of papers last Wednesday which consummated the $100,000 loan to Loendi Club by the Western Pennsylvania National Band of McKeesport. Bottom row, left to right Howard Hairston, Loendi financial secretary; Paul Kunkle, settlement officer for Union Title Guaranty Company: Robert T. MacEnheimer, Loendi Club president, and Atty. Harry Menzer of the law firm of Sachs, Pervin, Kaufman and Menzer, lawyer of the bank. Top row: Atty. W. Wendell Stanton, board member; Atty: Paul F. Jones, Loendi vice president and legal counsel; Roland T. Sawyer, chairman of the club's building committee; Percy A. Garland, guarantor, and William G. Nunn, Sr., board member. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of nine men, including seated: Howard Hairston, Paul Kunkle, Loendi Club president Robert T. McEnheimer, Atty. Harry Menzer, Atty. Wendell Stanton leaning on left, and standing: Paul F. Jones, Roland T. Sawyer, Percy A. Garland, and William G. Nunn, Sr., gathered to sign $100,000 loan for new Loendi Club, in office with landscape painting, and lamp with long decorative finial, another version
